column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=I 'm surprised by that .
#Text=That 's unusual , yeah .
#Text=One of the things that was mentioned earlier , most delightful about you guys is you were racing and " we were halfway down the course and we lost communication ! "
#Text=How does a blind skier deal with ...
#Text=Funny now .
#Text=Was bloody scary .
#Text=What race was that ?
#Text=It was the Giant Slalom in Vancouver at the Paralympics .
#Text=Actually , we were talking about this before .
#Text=It 's one of the unique aspects of wearing headsets and being able to communicate .
#Text=All the time while we were on the mountain earlier today , Eric had a stack and all he could hear as he was tumbling down was me laughing .
#Text=Yes ... I was n't feeling the love .
#Text=But um ... what was the question please ?
#Text=I could n't imagine anything scarier than charging down the mountain at high speed and losing that communications link .

#Text=The difficulty was in the Giant Slalom , it was raining , and being used to ski racing , I had never experienced skiing in the rain , and as soon as I came out of the start hut I lost all my sight , which is something that I had never experienced before .
#Text=Only having 8 per cent you treasure it and to lose all of it was a huge shock .
#Text=And then when I could n't hear Eric talking I realised that our headsets had malfunctioned because they 'd actually got rain into them .
#Text=Which normally would n't happen in the mountains because it would be snow .
#Text=So it was the scariest moment of my life .
#Text=Going down it was about getting to the bottom in one piece , not racing to win a medal , which was pretty difficult I guess or frustrating , given that it was the Paralympics .
#Text=I asked the standing guys upstairs : who is the craziest amongst all you skiers : the ones who ca n't see , the ones on the mono skis , or the one-legged or no-armed guys .
#Text=Who is the craziest one on the slopes ?
#Text=I think the completely blind .
#Text=If I was completely blind I would n't ski .
#Text=Some of the sit skiers are pretty crazy as well .
#Text=You have full control over your skis though .
#Text=You have both legs and both arms .
#Text=True , but you 've got absolutely no idea where you 're going .
#Text=And you have to have complete reliance on a person .
#Text=Trust that they are able to give you the right directions .
#Text=That you are actually going in the right direction .
#Text=It 's difficult with the sight that I have but I could n't imagine doing it with no sight at all .
